name: Calgary Flying Club
about: The Calgary Flying Club, located at Springbank Airport just west of Calgary, Alberta, has been a hub for flight training since 1927. Nestled in the foothills of the Canadian Rockies, the club offers a unique flying experience. It provides comprehensive training programs, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL) and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), with a fleet of well-maintained aircraft and experienced instructors. Members enjoy full access to facilities, discounted aviation fuel, and participation in various member events. The club is open to all aviation enthusiasts, with annual membership available for just $125 plus GST. Whether you're starting a career, advancing your skills, or pursuing a hobby, the Calgary Flying Club is a supportive and engaging community for all.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Instrument Rating (IR)
Night Rating"]
